modName: Retexture of The Witcher 2 Brigida Paperbrock Dress -- UNP (Replacer Version)
summary: This is a delicate cherry blossom and pink/purple hued Asian-inspired retexture of SumoJellyBean's Brigida Paperbrock Dress from The Witcher 2.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]
This is a simple delicate cherry blossom and pink/purple hued Asian-inspired 
retexture of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71062/?]The Witcher 2 Brigida Paperbrock Dress -- UNP by [b]SumoJellyBean[/b][/url]. 

(Due to popular demand, I have also added an immersive standalone version with a tiny mini quest and its own crafting system. You can get it here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84220?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84220?[/url])[/center][/size]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/GGUj008.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/N2zAB9w.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/4DUycaC.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]

[b]You will need to download the original file and just overwrite the original texture.
[/b]

[u][b]Credits
[/b]
[/u]Thanks to [b]SumoJellyBean [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71062/?]his original armor conversion from the Witcher 2[/url].
[/b]Thanks to Thank you CDProjektRed for making the Witcher 2 and [url=http://forums.cdprojektred.com/forum/en/the-witcher-series/general-discussions/22234-using-witcher-2-assets-for-other-games-is-this-allowed]allowing use of their assets[/url].
Thanks to [url=http://www.bellevuefineart.com/]www.bellevuefineart.com[/url] / [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/panacheart/]Scott Moore[/url] for sharing and allowing use of [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/panacheart/5559493577]the japanese cherry blossom paper texture[/url].[/center]
author: AlenisKendra
